name: Astrum
description:
A short two buttons puzzle game in which you have to help Ada climb the tower to see the stars.
Solve puzzles by rotating the room left or right and change gravity itself.

← left arrow key to rotate the room left
→ right arrow key to rotate the room right
Space to get trough the tutorial / title screen / end screen

Music and SFX uses sounds from Freesound

  • richcraftstudios
  • Benboncan
  • CaganCelik

Originally made as part of indie studio in Bezalel Academy of Art and design.
